name: mm-button
description: A fully-styled primary and secondary button.

attributes.name: type
attributes.description: The type of styling to be applied to the button

attributes.name: selected
attributes.description: Display the selected state of button, for use in a toggle scenario

attributes.name: fit
attributes.description: Instructs the component to fit to its parent container's width (percent or pixel width).

properties.name: type
properties.description: The type of the button -- which informs it's style ('primary' for primary, secondary otherwise).

properties.name: error
properties.description: Triggers the display of invalid visual state.
